about_the_game:
This strategy guide will list the choices you need to make to get ALL the endings, CGs, and tell you how to win the minigames! Don't play Mister Versatile without it! Strategy Guides are great because they make sure you get all the secret or hard to get endings in Mister Versatile. Do you know there's a 'What if you Pick No One' route?

Once you purchase and install/download the Strategy Guide in the DLC list of Mister Versatile in your Steam Library, you can find the files for it in your Local Files. Right-click the name of the game (Mister Versatile) from the list of games in your library, click Properties, go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the strategy guide in this folder.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexually explicit images are included to guide people through the minigames.
